channel.title: Comments on: Who is Satoshi Nakamoto?

item.title: By: Akash Chaudhary
item.dc:creator: Akash Chaudhary
item.description: We always want to see the real person who created bitcoin once in our life.
item.content:encoded: We always want to see the real person who created bitcoin once in our life.

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description:
Sincerely, this is a question I ask all the time. I have so many Newbies asking same. I will just share this.
Thanks to Atomic Team.
item.content:encoded:
Sincerely, this is a question I ask all the time. I have so many Newbies asking same. I will just share this.

item.title: By: Shariful Islam
item.dc:creator: Shariful Islam
item.description: Who is Sathoshi nakamoto? it's a mystery! Enjoyed to read this article and got the names of most possible candidates. Thanks for writing on this interesting topic!
item.content:encoded:
Who is Sathoshi nakamoto?
it’s a mystery! Enjoyed to read this article and got the names of most possible candidates.
Thanks for writing on this interesting topic!

item.title: By: Steven
item.dc:creator: Steven
item.description: After reading this, now I'm having a feeling that I need to meet Satoshi Nakamoto, LMAO. Atomic wallet has exposed alot to me about the history of Bitcoin
item.content:encoded: After reading this, now I’m having a feeling that I need to meet Satoshi Nakamoto, LMAO. Atomic wallet has exposed alot to me about the history of Bitcoin

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Atomicwallet really gives me the right to my funds than any other wallet.
item.content:encoded: Atomicwallet really gives me the right to my funds than any other wallet.
